snippet: Yet to feel completely at home on the Wimbledon lawns, Stan Wawrinka became the latest player to jump on the super-coach bandwagon by joining forces with former All England Club champion Richard Krajicek this month....
lead_paragraph: Yet to feel completely at home on the Wimbledon lawns, Stan Wawrinka became the latest player to jump on the super-coach bandwagon by joining forces with former All England Club champion Richard Krajicek this month.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Hopes Krajicek Can Make Him a Cut Above on Grass
headline.main: Wawrinka Hopes Krajicek Can Make Him a Cut Above on Grass
